## BronziteClient.login() method

Logs in to the Discord API and runs plugins.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
login(token?: string | undefined): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  token | string \| undefined | <i>(Optional)</i> The token to login with. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

A promise that resolves when the client is logged in and all plugins ran.
